reviews.title: Happy to have a reliable power bank
reviews.review_text: I got this 20000 mAh portable charger as a gift for my friend's daughter, and she absolutely loves it! She's so happy to have a reliable power bank that keeps her phone and tablet charged all day. The dual USB ports are super handy, and it works great with all her devices. Definitely a 5-star gift!

reviews.title: Reliable and powerful!
reviews.review_text: This power bank has been a lifesaver! It charges my phone super fast and holds a great amount of battery. I can charge my phone multiple times before needing to recharge the power bank itself. It's compact, easy to carry, and perfect for traveling or long days out. Definitely worth it!

reviews.title: 100% recommended
reviews.review_text: A very good portable charger. I liked it because it does exactly what it promises: it charges quickly, has good capacity, and is a convenient size to carry in a backpack. So far, I haven't had any problems; the battery lasts well and charges my phone several times without recharging. I would recommend it if you're looking for something reliable for travel or everyday use.

reviews.title: Compact and Efficient Charger
reviews.review_text: This is a well-built charger—compact and fairly lightweight. I tested it by charging my Android phone (Samsung S21e) from 20% to full, and it only used one out of the four bars on the indicator. That's impressive efficiency for a single charge cycle. Great for travel or everyday use.

reviews.title: Decent power bank
reviews.review_text: I recently bought the Yelomin 20000 mAh portable charger and so far, it's been a great purchase! The power bank feels solid and well-built, and I love the soft pink color—it looks sleek and modern. The dual USB ports are super convenient for charging both my phone and tablet at the same time. Overall, this is a solid and stylish power bank for the price, and I'd definitely recommend it if you're looking for something dependable and travel-friendly!

More like 10Ah than 20Ah. But your mileage will vary depending of drawn current. I got more long term succes if my cell phone is already at 100% and I plug the power bank the whole day so phone battery never drains. In this case current drawn is 0.5A. If I let the cell phone deplete close to zero and plug the power bank to both charge and continue to use the phone, then I might get 1.5 charge during one day. In this case current drawn is 1.8A. Also performance decrese below 12oC (55F) and charge time increase. Below 0oC (32F) it's useless for high drain applications. It might still be usefull for load below 0.5A.

reviews.title: Disappointed in Phone Charger
reviews.review_text: bought this to keep my work phone charged. It lasted about two weeks and would not charge my phone. I tried it on several other phone and would not work.

The first one I ordered worked great! It would charge my phone fully about 3 1/2 times before it needed recharging. I went ahead and bought 3 more for family. One didn't work right out of the box and the other two charged for one full charged and was used on our phones. Once the battery pack needed to be charged again it would just blink with one light and not charge. I am disappointed because I thought they were going to work so well.

reviews.title: Less than 10,000 mah capacity. Completely lies
reviews.review_text: This power bank is maybe 5,000 mah capacity. I used a name brand 10,000 mah battery pack that was dead to charge it and this "20,000 mah" pack charged the 10,000 mah pack less than half before it died. It also weighed about the same as the 10,000 mah battery pack. Complete lies from the seller for actual capacity.

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK FOR IPHONE 13pro MAX
reviews.review_text: Got this and it DOES NOT WORK AT ALL I have an original iPhone port I also have the lightning cable. I removed my base from socket and put into power bank then into iPhone DID NOTHING. Went to attempt to charge my daughters iPad which is a C-Type using the small black cord it came with it started charging the power bank INSTEAD OF HER IPAD (10th gen) when using the black c type cord it came with and adding the iPhone base it does not charge the power bank at all. Works for android device my dad had…AGAIN NOT MADE FOR IPHONE

reviews.title: 20000 mAh Portable Charger Power Bank Dual USB...
reviews.review_text: This product is very good and the battery lasts a long time. I am very satisfied using it because this product really helps me when I travel long distances...

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: Great power bank. It fast charges so you don't wait for ever.Use it at conferences, traveling and going to ballgames. Charges multiple phones. Your friend will love you. Everyone should have one handy.

reviews.title: Cute and great charge!!!!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS THING. STAYS CHARGED AND CHARGES FAST THANK YOU I go on bike rides and this is a necessity. I love it and it's pink I'm obsessed ngl holds a lot of charge!!!

reviews.title: Nice and useful!
reviews.review_text: This portable charger power bank is very useful to bring it with you anywhere you go, have enough mAh to charge up to five times for my iPhone, love it.

there's absolutely no way this is 20k. I charged my phone full once and to 60% the 2nd time. it's less than half the thickness of other 20k packs I have and a third the weight. my true 20k packs will charge my phone 4-5 times. waste of money

reviews.title: Best portable battery charger ever!
reviews.review_text: This portable phone charger is a must for me!I get out to go shopping from time to time %26 would need to charge my phone,so I would take this charger with me to charge my phone if I'm out %26 about longer than I need to be!If you want a portable phone charger,get this one!You won't go wrong!

reviews.title: Bought as gifts and did not work! DO NOT BUY!!!
reviews.review_text: Bought not 1, but 4 of these for Christmas gifts and finally got around to ask how they liked them...To my dismay, they've reported that NONE of them work!!! I just checked and the return window closed at the end of Jan (which is shorter than the normal Walmart return window). So now we are stuck with these useless paperweights! DO NOT BUY!!!

reviews.title: Worth to buy
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this portable power bank, and it has been a lifesaver! Its compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for travel or daily use. The charging capacity is impressive—it fully charges my phone multiple times on a single charge. It also charges devices quickly, which is super convenient when I'm on the go. The added features, like multiple USB ports and an LED indicator, make it even more versatile and user-friendly. Highly recommend this for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient power bank

reviews.title: ok, not the best...
reviews.review_text: It's ok.... however I would return it if it hadn't been such a great deal - not worth it to return for 12 bucks. I have a Pixel phone and it barely charges it twice. Sometimes just once. Maybe I got a faulty one. it is light for it's size though, I'll give it that.

reviews.title: highly recommend！
reviews.review_text: This power bank is absolutely amazing! It has a large capacity, lasting for several days on a single charge, which makes it perfect for travel or daily use. The charging speed is super fast, and it can charge multiple devices at the same time, which is incredibly convenient. Despite its high capacity, the design is lightweight and easy to carry.Overall, it's great value for money, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Fast. Compact. Versatile. A Great Value!
reviews.review_text: Great power bank. It fast charges so you don't wait for ever. It's got multiple plugs for charging multiple devices at same time. It's small and compact so it travels well and can store easy. It fits in my pocket easy! The storage capacity is high so it charges my iPad easy. Great value and would recommend!

reviews.title: It Gets the Job Done
reviews.review_text: It Gets the Job Done, But Nothing Special I bought this power bank mainly for traveling and daily backup charging. It works fine for the most part — it charges my phone about 1.5 times on a full charge, which is decent but not amazing for the size. It's not the fastest when it comes to recharging itself either, so you have to plan ahead. The build quality is alright — feels a bit plasticky but hasn't given me any trouble so far. The size is pocket-friendly, which I like, and it's light enough to carry around in my bag. Overall, it's an okay backup option, but I wouldn't rely on it for heavy use or long trips. If you just need something basic for emergencies, this does the trick. --- If you'd like, I can tailor it to a specific model or your actual experience — just let me know!

The directions say to charge for a full 8 hours. However, the battery was fully charged at around five hours.So I let it go until six hours. now, i have issues with it saying it's fully charged after a few hours, but then when I plug it to my phone, there's no charge on it. most times it works perfectly, but there are a few times where I have had an issue.

reviews.title: It is small and portable, charges quickly and has
reviews.review_text: This power bank is of good quality, with a decent charging speed. It has all the necessary ports, including both Type-C and USB interfaces. It also features a remaining battery display. Its slim design makes it easy to carry in a bag or pocket. I hope it lasts for a long time!

reviews.title: The charge lasts a long time
reviews.review_text: I work a lot with my phone, so the battery runs out quickly, and this charger has saved my life. It lasts a long time, is very effective, charges with extraordinary speed, and I can take it everywhere.

reviews.title: Powers up my devices quickly and efficiently
reviews.review_text: This 20,000 mAh Portable Charger Power Bank is an absolute lifesaver! I purchased it for my iPhone and iPad, and it has exceeded all my expectations. The massive capacity allows me to charge both devices multiple times without needing to recharge the power bank itself, making it perfect for travel, long days out, or emergencies. The dual USB ports are incredibly convenient, allowing me to charge two devices simultaneously, and the charging speed is impressive—it powers up my devices quickly and efficiently. The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry in my bag without adding bulk. It's also well-built, with a sturdy exterior that feels durable and reliable. The power bank comes with a handy LED indicator that shows the remaining battery life, which is a thoughtful touch. Overall, this power bank is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a dependable, high-capacity portable charger. Highly recommend!

this power bank is not even close to 20000 milliamps as it states. totaly full is just one full charge to my cellphone, and that's it. I don't understand how Walmart let this company sell this product as a 20000 power bank when that thing is probably not more than 4000 or less milliamps. This is a total scam!

reviews.title: Not worth it it.
reviews.review_text: I read good reviews and bought this portable charger and have had nothing but trouble. I ordered three, but only two were delivered. Issues: 1- These batteries are not sent with instructions. 2- The on-off switch is inconsistent and does not always work. 3- The battery does not hold charge for more than a few days. 4- It's not clear that every port is bidirectional, as I expected that each port USB, USB-C can both charge a phone and be used to charge the battery pack. These issues were probably known by the maker. Do not buy this.

reviews.title: Great powerful portable battery, charges fast
reviews.review_text: Awesome portable charger. My phone runs out of battery often and sometimes when I play games or watch videos, batteries drains really fast, this portable battery saves me many times since it can charge my phone more than once. Definitely cannot live without a large capacity battery pack. Recommend

reviews.title: Small Size, Big Power
reviews.review_text: Bought the white Yelomin 20000mAh charger for its portability. Verdict? Love it! It's super compact and light – finally a powerful charger that fits in my purse without being bulky. Plus, it actually looks good in white. Capacity is excellent - charges my devices multiple times, quickly too. Dual USB ports are convenient. It's reliable, works with all my devices, and the LED indicator is handy. One negative review online worried me, but my experience has been great.

reviews.title: Really have 20K AHM POWER BANK
reviews.review_text: received the product today and it definitely works to charge my phone. I like its compact size. It is a good weight and was charged at 60% out of the box. I saw a review from someone who said they had to ask for a new one because the power bank itself wouldn't charge over 60%. After testing it out of the box to see if it could charge my phone, I decided to plug the battery back to charge up it to see if it would charge above 60%. It does! It is now at 80% charged and charging to 100%. Took maybe a couple of hours. So far this is looking like a solid portable power bank. Update: the battery pack charged to 100% after about 3 or 4 hours

well it doesn't seem to charge like I thought it would I'm upset because of the delivery I can't get FedEx to drop off my packages I know that's not your guys's situation just want to let you know you might want to try to use somebody else I got packages today and I don't think they're going to deliver them I had to go pick them up last time and I'm not doing that again

reviews.title: Solid reliable
reviews.review_text: I've been using the 20000 mAh Portable Charger Power Bank (Black), and it's quickly become a must-have in my travel bag and daily routine. With such a large capacity, I can easily charge my iPhone multiple times before needing to recharge the power bank itself. It also works flawlessly with my iPad, Galaxy phone, and even my Pixel device. The dual USB ports are super convenient—I can charge two devices at once without sacrificing speed. It's a little on the heavier side, but that's expected for a battery pack with this kind of capacity. The design is sleek and simple, and the black finish looks good while resisting fingerprints and smudges. Whether you're traveling, working remotely, or just want peace of mind that you won't run out of juice during the day, this power bank gets the job done. Definitely worth the price for the power and reliability it provides

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.review_text: This power bank is really very practical! The appearance design is simple and generous, the feel is also very good, and it is very convenient to carry. The battery capacity is large enough to give my phone several charges on a single charge, and I don't have to worry about running out of battery when I leave the house. Charging speed is also very fast, support fast charging function, saving a lot of time. In short, this charging treasure is extremely cost-effective, and is highly recommended for friends who need to go out often or have a need for electricity!

reviews.title: generous design and powerful
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this rechargeable battery and I'm really happy with it! First of all, it has a simple and generous design and a nice feel, so it's very convenient to put it in your bag or pocket. Most importantly, it's very powerful and can charge your cell phone multiple times in one full charge, perfect for a long time on the go.
I am going to a concert and this is the perfect charger for my phone it can charge up to three times
after initially charging it I wait a few hours and charge it more. sometimes it will charge for another hour.

this is a must have for anybody who does traveling. when my phone was running low I just plugged it right into this portable charger and it charged up in no time.

reviews.title: Highly recommended power bank
reviews.review_text: Was looking for portable charger power bank from long time for traveling purpose and I believe I made a perfect decision in buying this. Quality is great and slick. Highly recommend if someone is looking for portable charger power bank.

Nothing special, but it holds a decent charge to keep your phone from dying on you. Better than most battery packs I have had previously. Good for maintenance charging if you have a quick draining battery.

reviews.title: Great for kids!
reviews.review_text: My 13 year old is outside all day for camp and he can go with an empty battery on his phone but in like an hour his phone is completely charged again with this. It takes about 2 hours to charge tbis from empty. Perfect for outside in the summer.
It was actually a great product to have. We have a lot of power outages in our area. I can even take to charge my phone in my purse during church, also. I love it!

The powerbank holds it's charge well and truly does charge my phone quixkly, however I was concerned to find out that the USB C port is only to charge the power bank, and only the USB A porta can be used to exert power to a cord and device...

reviews.title: My phone's new bff
reviews.review_text: This charging brick is perfect for my travels. My phone doesn't hold a charge too long and this is the best thing when I'm on the move. Easy to use and the battery holds a pretty long charge, because it can charge my phone and still have juice.

reviews.title: Compact and does the job! Perfect while traveling!
reviews.review_text: Great value for money compact power bank which is easy to carry around. Very useful while traveling or camping. Keeps your gadgets running so makes it not only an economical but a practical purchase. Easy to charge and discharge :)

reviews.title: Fast charging
reviews.review_text: Fast charging power bank. It completes one single charge with my phone about the same time I use wall charger. Pretty amazing with the speed. And also it gets fully charged just in 2 hrs plugged in your pc or wall outlet. Highly recommended

reviews.review_text: Received in open box. No cord to use. Will not work with out the cord. Very disappointed. Why send a product to another person when the box is open and has missing material.

reviews.title: compact reliable worth to buy
reviews.review_text: This Yelomin 20,000 mAh power bank is tough, charges my phone and tablet fast, and has two USB ports. It's compact, reliable, and worth grabbing for on-the-go. Solid choice.highly recommend
several delays and changes in the delivery dates. when contacted to verify delivery date was referred to the manufacturer who never responded back . when object did arrive it was in pieces literally.

reviews.title: Great power bank
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received it. The white color looks very beautiful. I have used it for a while. The battery capacity is sufficient to charge my iPad. It is not heavy and is very convenient to put in a bag.

reviews.title: Doesn't work.
reviews.review_text: Doesn't charge my phone. At first it would only keep my phone at the current battery percentage but not charge it. Then it stopped working altogether. Only used it a handful of times.

reviews.title: Reliable and Powerful Charger!
reviews.review_text: This 20000mAh power bank is a lifesaver! It charges my phone several times and works perfectly with my tablet and other devices. Compact design, fast charging, and great for travel.

reviews.title: Doesn't work with I Phone 15
reviews.review_text: This power bank will not work with either my I Phone 15 or I Pad unless you use the short 8 inch cable that comes with the charger. My I Phone cable IOS will not work with it nor any other cable I tried. I either get a message saying too much power or it simply does not charge. I have ordered another cable at additional expense. If it doesn't work I will get the pleasure of waiting in a long line at my local Walmart to return both charger and new cable.

reviews.title: Significantly overstated capacity
reviews.review_text: Measured total charge capacity with my meter from absolutely dead until it would no longer take any current three times. Not once did capacity exceed 8400mAh. Given the country of manufacture, I expect the capacity to be overstated, but by over double is ridiculous. Waste of money

reviews.title: a Bobby was find
reviews.review_text: I have been shopping for a universal charger keep in my pocketbook in case I can't find a charging station when I'm out of you house. it is such a needed item for those who might have yours cell phone stop working when you are away from a wall outlet.

Absolute garbage. Ordered two of them, thinking they would be good to have in an emergency, well I thought wrong. First off, no way are they 20,000mah capacity. After following instructions and charging them, I plugged my phone into it. After gaining 5% charge, the battery has already dropped 1 of 4 bars. Ain't no way in heck a 20,000 battery should have gone through 25% of its charge for 5% phone battery. Have 8000mah batteries that gave almost two full charges before being empty. Second, it does not support fast charging or type c to type c charging. Must rely on slower, outdated USB ports. 3rd, both batteries make this God awful whining sound when charging. Tried different cords, same result. Will most definitely be requesting a refund

reviews.title: Big promisess but delivers 28% of the promise
reviews.review_text: It charges slowly. It charges the phone slowly. First use? It charged my phone 1.3 times ONLY! It cannot charfe 2 phones as promised bc it lacks the promised storage capacity. I cannot recommend this item at all. Low quality. Underperformed. Super short 10 inch cord!!!

reviews.title: Life saver
reviews.review_text: This 20,000mAh portable charger is an absolute lifesaver and a must-have for anyone on the go. Here's why it stands out: 1. Massive Battery Capacity: With 20,000mAh, this power bank provides multiple full charges for my devices. It's perfect for long trips, busy days, or emergencies when I can't access a power outlet. 2. Dual USB Ports: The dual USB outputs are super convenient, allowing me to charge two devices simultaneously. Whether it's my iPhone and iPad or helping a friend charge their phone, it handles the load effortlessly. 3. Universal Compatibility: It works seamlessly with all my devices, including my iPhone, Galaxy, and even my tablet. No compatibility issues at all! 4. Sleek and Lightweight Design: Despite its large capacity, the power bank is slim and lightweight, making it easy to carry in my bag or pocket. The white finish gives it a clean and modern look. 5. Fast Charging: The charging speed is impressive! It charges my devices quickly and efficiently, saving me time when I'm in a hurry. 6. Durable and Reliable: It feels sturdy and well-made. I've been using it regularly, and it's proven to be reliable with no signs of wear or diminished performance. Overall, this portable charger is an excellent investment for anyone who needs a dependable and powerful power bank. It's affordable, versatile, and incredibly practical. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great little power bank
reviews.review_text: This has become our favorite power bank. It is our go to when we travel. It charges quickly. It has all the cables we need built in. It lasts so long. We charge so many devices on one power bank charge The little carrying strap is so convenient. Nice little addition that gets overlooked. It's not much thicker than a phone with a case. Not bulky for what you get It's an awesome little power bank that packs some power

I've received this power bank for 5 days, and now, I'd like to share some of my thoughts. Pro: powerful charging port, high speed charging; high plenty power inside the bank, I had iPad and two iPhones, this can support all of them! Con: the charger is a bit heavy and doesn't come with the wire, especially TYPE-C, so you have to bring your own wire for type c devices. Over all, it's very good and quality power bank!

reviews.title: Great charger
reviews.review_text: This is a Great charger, as I take it everywhere with me and don't have to worry about my phone or other device running out of power or the battery going dead!

I travel a lot and was looking for a good power bank. Finally I found a good one with 20000mah that is good to charge my phone 3-4 times. Best for long and quick charge. This came with type C charger so saved money on cable purchase too.

reviews.title: Charge box
reviews.review_text: Purchased it for my husband he loves it. Keep his phone charged all day earbuds whatever he needs and I'll actually use it myself. Best thing we ever bought about to buy me one.

reviews.review_text: As soon as I received it, I turned it on and used it. I charged the mobile phone two or three times before it used up its power. It was very practical.

reviews.title: Great for multiple device
reviews.review_text: This power bank is a light weight, reliable and user-friendly option for anyone needing a powerful, portable charging solution. It has two inputs and two outputs which allows to charge multiple device simultaneously.
Best one… charges upto 3 phones easily . Very handy and reliable and great price
